name: Block Puzzle Jewel World
description:
Block Puzzle Jewel World is a free, simple and fun puzzle that keeps your brain sharp and boost memory.

The goal is to drag and drop blocks in order to make them full the vertical and horizontal lines then the whole line will be cleared. If there is no space for the given block on the screen, the game will be over. Try to clear more lines and get higher scores!

Think carefully before you drop the blocks. Try to clear more lines and leave the space the following blocks. Put the blocks in the reasonable space depending on their shapes.

It is really a casual puzzle game for your free time. You can't stop playing it once you start the game!Train your brain and enjoy the fun during playing this game!

Block Puzzle Jewel World features:
• With beautiful jewels themes, you can enjoy this easy but addictive puzzle game to relieve stress.
• Play game without internet, with no time or network limit, you can relax yourself deeply.
• Get bored with normal casual puzzle games? Try this brand new one and enjoy totally free gameplay surrounded by amazing graphics and sound effects.

Challenge this addictive Block Puzzle Jewel World game and get the higher score now!
